discourse_list.title: The Devcon VI Endgame Kickoff w/Matthew Rabinowitz of 6S Capital, on Drinks with MakerDAO Delegates

content.content: The Endgame Stance with 6S Capital As we look forward  to the much anticipated  Devcon VI in Bogota, Colombia this October, we catch up with the Godfather of MIP21, Matt Rabinowitz the co-founder of 6S Capital. We talk with Matt about the state of Real World Assets within MakerDAO, how the Endgame plan could benefit the overall scopes of MakerDAO, and how 6S Capital is looking to help scale the DAO into primetime status. We hope you enjoy this special episode as much as we did, and get a good idea where the mindset of Matt and 6S Capital are in the grand scheme of RWA innovations.  Not Financial Advice This Content is for entertainment and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the FlipFlopFlap YouTube Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by @mrabino1 a.k.a, Matthew Rabinowitz,  @ultraschuppi a.k.a, Tim Schuppner @ElProgreso a.k.a, Frank Cruz @rspa a.k.a, Raphael Spannocchi, Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, Flipside Crypto, 6S Capital, or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.  The Tastings El Pro: Naturally Squeezed Orange  Juice , Medellin, Colombia   4 Stars     Schuppi: Flensburger Brauerei Pilsner, Flensburg, Germany   4 Stars     Raphael: Tegernseer Helles, Bavaria    3.5 Stars     Matt: Costco Black Coffee  Every State in the United States   2 Stars
